name: Zanny Begg
biography: Zanny Begg (born 1972) is an Australian artist-filmmaker. Begg works between documentary and fiction using experimental forms of storytelling to explore hidden and/or contested histories.  Begg is a participatory and collaborative artist who has exhibited in multiple exhibitions around the world including the Istanbul Biennale (2010); Taipei Biennial (2008), Sharjah Biennale (2011); and The National New Australian Art (2017). Her work consistently returns to themes of gender, spatial justice and resistance. Source: Wikidata; 01/08/2023
